com.flowpowered.persistence

Class ReflectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.persistence.ReflectionUtils

  • public class ReflectionUtils
extends Object
    Various utility methods that deal with reflection

      • getClassesForPackage

        public static List<Class<?>> getClassesForPackage(String packageName,
                                                  boolean recursive)
                                           throws ClassNotFoundException
        Attempts to list all the classes in the specified package as determined by the context class loader
        Parameters:
        packageName - the package name to search
        recursive - if the search should include all subdirectories
        Returns:
        a list of classes that exist within that package
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if the package had invalid classes, or does not exist

                                       Class<? extends Annotation>... annotations)
